InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S5 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 5

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: M6A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 4

Behring's M6A is a versatile high velocity energy autocannon, designed to provide to keep your enemy at range without sacrificing your stopping power.

InstalledItem.Name: M5A Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Laser Cannon
Size: 3

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Description: Multitask on the battlefield with this remote turret system. Featuring precise controls and a wide field of fire, the turret allows pilots to add combat support to their resume.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-423 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 2xS3

Behring’s MSD-423 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S3 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Arrester III Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Cross Section
Size: 3

Using cross section targeting to hunt for its prey, the Firestorm Arrester proximity missile makes quick work of enemies caught in the crosshairs.

InstalledItem.Name: 5CA 'Akura'
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Behring 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Behring’s belief in balanced shield design is evident with the 5CA. This large shield generator is equally focused on providing acceptable shield health along with decent damage absorption.

InstalledItem.Name: DayBreak
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Sakura Sun knows exactly what you need. The DayBreak is a straightforward power plant that provides parity to its performance, durability, and stealth stats.

InstalledItem.Name: DayBreak
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Sakura Sun knows exactly what you need. The DayBreak is a straightforward power plant that provides parity to its performance, durability, and stealth stats.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star EX
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span 
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Frost-Star EX cooler comes to you from J-Span, a manufacturer with a well deserved reputation among ship owners for constructing coolers that can reliably handle heat exchange wherever you may fly.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star EX
InstalledItem.Description:

InstalledItem.Name: Torrent
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: ArcCorp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Whatever destination you choose, the ArcCorp Torrent quantum drive is a solid choice to help get you there direct and hassle-free.

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.
